users.name: Erica P
users.description: I love comedy so much!!! Laughing is great!!

users.name: Sam C
users.description: Comedy is cool and fun. I like lighter-hearted stuff, especially dad jokes. I make great ones. I love puns.

users.name: Stella D
users.description: I love comedy so much!!!! I wish I was always watching comedy!!!!!

specials.name: Man On Fire
specials.comments: This is really funny! It's not my favorite by him but I do love it

specials.name: X
specials.comments: This is the greatest comedy special! I think it should be required viewing for everyone. I've made so many people watch it!

specials.name: Jigsaw
specials.comments: I recommend this for everyone, but especially my friends with relationship issues of any kind! Saving the world!

specials.name: Jigsaw
specials.comments: My girlfriend made me watch this on our like second date, very good relationship prep

specials.name: X
specials.comments: There's a bit in here about horses that I love (almost as much as I love horses) but the end was very real and dark. Was not prepared.

specials.name: Quarter Life Crisis
specials.comments: She is so funny! She is young and relatable and isn't as dark or weird as other specials I've been shown. I loved it.

specials.name: I Got This
specials.comments: I like the hard-hitting kinda mean silly stuff

specials.name: Hot For My Name
specials.comments: I love all of the creative things she did in this special. I had seen some of this stuff at Zanies, and it was so fun to watch it recorded with the outfit changes and the "bonus" footage.

specials.name: Glitter Room
specials.comments: I really hated this. I wanted to like it so badly but I just couldn't.

specials.name: The New One
specials.comments: I didn't want to mark this as dark comedy because I love dark comedy and hated this. This was so not funny and the man needs serious therapy.

specials.name: Right Now
specials.comments: This wasn't funny. It wasn't a good apology. It wasn't a fresh take. It wasn't a hot take. It was a waste of my time.

specials.name: Unveiled
specials.comments: I couldn't even finish this. I'm so torn on Iliza in general because some of her physical comedy is amazing, but a lot of her stuff just isn't funny. This is "woo comedy" and I really couldn't stand it.

specials.name: Baby Skeletons
specials.comments: I'm not a big comedy album person but wow, this was amazing. I saw some of these jokes on the Impractical Jokers cruise, and I'm so glad I can hear them again on repeat. She is so funny and there is so much gold on this album.

specials.name: Mother Inferior
specials.comments: It hurts me to select dark comedy because she thinks she is funny and dark but she is just awful and not funny. I want this time of my life back.

specials.name: All Over The Map
specials.comments: I know I wrote it was 1 hour long but I made it about 10 minutes before having to turn it off. It's so bad.

specials.name: Growing
specials.comments: I think I made it about 30 minutes through before having to turn this off. Amy Schumer offends me with how awful she is.

comedians.name: Ryan O'Flanagan
comedians.watched: Overly Excited Tourist on YouTube, saw him at Zanies and on Parahoy
comedians.toWatch: Anything I can he is amazing
comedians.comments: he's the funniest and his Overly Excited Tourist videos are the best

comedians.name: Taylor Tomlinson
comedians.watched: Quarter Life Crisis, Comedians of the World, everything on YouTube
comedians.toWatch: I haven't watched all of her podcast episodes
comedians.comments: She's so funny! She's so young and talented and has such a bright future. It's been really cool to watch her following grow over the past year

comedians.name: Whitney Cummings
comedians.watched: Can I Touch It, I'm your Girlfriend, Whitney
comedians.toWatch: Money Shot, I Love You, The Female Brain
comedians.comments: I don't love her comedy but I love her sitcom writing and her podcast!

comedians.name: Adrienne Iapalucci
comedians.watched: Degenerates special, saw her on the Impractical Jokers cruise
comedians.toWatch: I can't wait to listen to her album that comes out in a few weeks!
comedians.comments: She's so funny and I hope to one day be as funny and dark as her

comedians.name: Tom Segura
comedians.comments: He's so funny! unexpectedly dark, his special that came out this year is amazing

comedians.name: Sam C
comedians.comments: I'm the funniest person my jokes are the best

comedians.name: Dusty Slay
comedians.watched: Local spots, Comedy Central standup on Youtube
comedians.comments: He's a local comic who is so funny. He deserves to be so much more well-known.

comedians.name: Sam Morril
comedians.comments: He's really funny. I watched him mostly because he was dating Taylor Tomlinson, but I'm glad I did. I need to check out the rest of his stuff!

comedians.name: John Mulaney
comedians.comments: He's not my #1 and I don't love him as much as everyone else my age, but he is still very funny and talented

comedians.name: Melissa Villasenor
comedians.watched: I saw her once at Zanies and her appearance on Whitney Cummings' podcast
comedians.comments: Melissa is so talented. We went to see her at Zanies just because it was my friend's birthday, but she blew me away. Her impressions are incredible and she just had so many funny things to say.

comedians.name: Bill Burr
comedians.watched: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way, the epic crowd video
comedians.comments: He's so funny. Some of his takes are a little out there, but at the end of the day he's hilarious and tries to say something with his comedy.

comedians.name: Dave Chapelle
comedians.toWatch: Everything I possibly can. He's a genius
comedians.comments: Everyone loves Dave Chapelle, and if you don't, you don't love comedy. He's truly a genius.

comedians.name: Bo Burnham
comedians.watched: Words, Words, Words, I'm Bo Yo, what., Make Happy
comedians.comments: He's probably the first comedian I ever actually loved. I used to listen to his albums and songs all the time!

comedians.name: Zainab Johnson
comedians.watched: I saw a 15 minute set at the Improv, and 100 Humans on Netflix
comedians.comments: She is so funny. She should be much more famous than she is!

comedians.name: Rosebud Baker
comedians.toWatch: I need to look for more of her content!
comedians.comments: I watched her stuff because Daniel Sloss suggested it and I'm glad I did! I have a ticket to watch her on Zoom soon!

comedians.name: Ali Wong
comedians.watched: Baby Cobra, Hard Knock Wife, saw her at Largo on Pete Homes' show
comedians.toWatch: Anything she ever does. She's too funny
comedians.comments: Ali Wong is so popular yet somehow so underrated. She's so incredibly hilarious and I'm still so glad she was a surprise guest on a show I went to. I didn't love the show but she made it worth it.

comedians.name: Bryan
comedians.comments: I'm sad I'm missing out on future dad jokes
